source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Heritage  Crochet Lace In Contemporary Application

visible_instructors.title: Rita de Maintenon
visible_instructors.name: Rita
visible_instructors.job_title: Fiber Artist, Designer, Author, Teacher, Restorations

items.headline: How to enrich Your Designs with Heirloom Lace Techniques
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to make Broomstick Lace, Hairpin Lace and Tunisian Crochet and  Lace. They will be ble to include these techniques within their own designs.
Historical Background of Broomstick Lace
A Look at Broomstick Lace Tools

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor Illustrator. Bc. of Architecture and Fine Arts.
visible_instructors.name: Julie

items.headline: You will learn fundamentals of work with light and color in still life with roses from experienced artist
objectives_summary: How to understand and analyse object you would like to draw
How to paint roses without a photo or a reference
Discover how to paint any bouquets with flowers

objectives_summary: The principles of color theory

visible_instructors.name: Froyle
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist with over 25 years of experience

items.headline: Perfect for Beginners to Unlock Your Creative Potential
objectives_summary: You will learn techniques for a making a variety of collage papers and then we will put the pieces together into a finished mixed media painting.
Techniques include: How to create an image transfer
Using paper packaging and finding affordable collage materials

items.headline: How to create a mixed media inspiration journal by up-cycling a simple brochure using found papers
objectives_summary: In this class students will learn two things, one, how to create a beautiful mixed paper journal from a simple brochure and two, how to turn this journal into a personal inspiration journal.

objectives_summary: You will learn to make leather cardholder step-by-step.

objectives_summary: Digital sketching process as preparation for painting with traditional media - watercolor and acrylic
